name: The Silver Kord
description:
Agent Aleks finds himself on the United States in a secret mission. 

Nevertheless, he falls asleep the night before.

Now he has to escape his dreams and come back to the real world before it's too late.

Made for my studies final project.

I developed this game in around 3 months and it's the first one I managed to actually "finish" (if you can count 1 level as the whole game). It has flaws, very visible ones, be aware. 

P.S.: There are no dogs in this game (what you see is a devilish creature from the pits of hell that looks [and sounds] very similar to a dog) so don't feel bad for having to get some coins.
